converse.line: Howdy, Emere! It's been going swell. My boy been giving you any trouble?
He's just fine. One of my better students.
My Edwin just loves your class. Can't stop making art.
He's got a real passion, I tell you. He'll make it big in the art world.

random.line: He's got to learn there're consequences for every action. He doesn't do well, he needs a different environment. It's a bit more expensive to move to Ginga, but we'll manage.
Do you believe Eira's messing with Edwin's grades?
No! I'd never doubt the integrity of any teacher! They've good moral standards, ya know? It's just a lie Edwin made to convince me to let him stay.
Why move Edwin if he's doing better in his other classes?
Well, ya know he doesn't really connect with any other teacher besides ya. I want him to be successful in all subjects.

converse.line: Edwin says he wants to speak with ya.
It looks like Edwin recovered his grade at the last minute.
I'm speechless, ya know? I didn't know he had it in him. Well, I guess we can stay here now. Edwin likes it here too.
He's got determination when a subject is important to him. He'll do great in whatever he decides to do.
